# cancel(_:)

**Instance Method**

Removes a set of downloads from the download list.

## Declaration

```swift
func cancel(_ downloads: [SKDownload])
```

## Parameters

- **downloads**: An array of [doc://com.apple.storekit/documentation/StoreKit/SKDownload] objects to cancel.

## Downloading Content

- **start(_:)**: Adds a set of downloads to the download list.
- **pause(_:)**: Pauses a set of downloads.
- **resume(_:)**: Resumes a set of downloads.
